name: Loaded Die
description:
Note: submitted build for the voting is very scuffed. Checkpoints are not working, damage is not balanced, sounds are not balanced etc...

Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • Space to dodge.
  • W to jump.
  • Left click to attack
Fate:

Every few seconds a dice is rolled, and a fate is chosen depending on the number rolled. Each fate has a different effect.

A fate ghost can exchange your current fates with some new fates.
